name: D&D Map Viewer
description:
Hey!

This is the Map Viewer that I've made for our Dungeons and Dragons Campaigns. Feel free to use it. I will be updating and improving it overtime.

If you have any suggestions and ideas for the program please let me know!

NOTE: Exported to be used on 1920x1080 Monitor/Projector in Fullscreen (Full screen button in bottom right of game view)
